page.title: 13STROOD MARKET
page.content:
My name is Sonia Chhabra. I rarely go down to Strood market, but when I do I enjoy myself very much. It opens every Tuesday from 8 a.m - 4.30 p.m. They have various items of clothing for all generations, which are at reasonable prices. I think they ought to have this market more than once a week. They sell vegetables, fruit, fish, shoes, jewellery and many fashionable clothes. Every Tuesday people rush down there to get their goods, while the kids are at school. The noise is tremendous whilst the market sellers shout at the top of their voices, trying to get rid of their goods.
By Sonia Chhabra Chapter School
